name: Touch Media 360
description:
Touch Media was founded in 2004 by Angheliu Alexandru as a designer and sole employee :).  We continued shyly until 2006 when we decided to enter the market of web development in Constanta, a totally immature market, but increasingly higher demands. 2006 was the time when the companies  started investing in websites. Weak competition and dedication allowed us to develop and to form a small programming team that managed to develop more and more complex projects using various technical solutions.
 
 
In 2008 - 2009 we expanded our activity  in Bucharest, Brasov, Timisoara and Cluj and that enabled us to greatly expand our customer portfolio to attract large companies and to work to another level.
 
 
The moment we entered further  the international market.  We started in Canada with two customers and then we branched in Germany, Holland, US, UK etc.
 
 
Now, after 10 years of activity, Touch Media has a strong team working for renowned national and international brands and carries out complex projects, large and very large projects, and the ambitions are even bigger.
